remarks: The derivative function takes values in the complex numbers. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Aug-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 9-Feb-2015.)
statement:
dvcl.s $e |- ( ph -> S C_ CC ) $.
dvcl.f $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> CC ) $.
dvcl.a $e |- ( ph -> A C_ S ) $.
dvcl $p |- ( ( ph /\ B ( S _D F ) C ) -> C e. CC ) $.
